1.title: Black Cats Do Not Dream of Stars

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

1.plot: Some call the Contractors the next step of human evolution, but their kind has changed even since they first appeared. The remorseless calculation of those sent as surrogate assassins has always been their signature, but at some point, the writing on the wall began to change. Compassion among killers. Cooperation among thieves. BK201 has been chosen by fate to usher in a new era within this new age. Something big is on the horizon for those who dwell in the shadows, but as the spotted sun rises over Hell's Gate, the clock ticks toward imminent destruction. Should the ...

2.title: Fallen Meteor

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

2.plot: Kirihara has searched long and hard for BK201?s true identity, and what she discovers of his past is shocking, but the impending destruction of Tokyo is foremost on the minds facing off in this final battle.

3.title: Vanishing in a Sea of Ice

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

3.plot: Hei and Suo attempt to flee Russia, but their escape efforts are hindered by Contractors and gun-toting soldiers. As the body count rises, Suo finds herself undergoing a shocking metamorphosis.

4.title: The Ark Adrift on the Lake

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

4.plot: In Japan, Suo begins honing her combat skills under the watchful eyes of Hei and July. Meanwhile, Kirihara - still puzzled BK-201's disappearance - gets acquainted with the agents of Section 3.

5.title: Gunsmoke Blows, Life Flows

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

5.plot: After Section 3 pushes Suo and Hei deeper underground, BK-201 must resurface to steal an object known as Izanami. The mission could get complicated - the agent tasked with guarding the object is none other than Kirihara.

6.title: An Aroma Sweet, a Heart Bitter

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

6.plot: Hei learns the truth about the mysterious Izanami. If BK-201 wants to reach the object before it's destroyed, he'll have to defeat Genma - and stop Suo from pulling the trigger.

7.title: The Doll Sings in the Winter Wind

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

7.plot: Suo and July find themselves in a dangerous situation thanks to a double-crossing supposed ally. Later, when the young pair is abducted by an especially sinister Contractor, BK-201 must spring into action.

8.title: Twinkling Sun on a Summer Day

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

8.plot: Aboard a speeding train, Hei's team is ambushed by Russian authorities. In the ensuing battle, Suo and Tanya recall the times they shared in the past as friends - and clash violently in the present as Contractors.

9.title: They Met One Day, Unexpectedly

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

9.plot: Kiko and Kurasawa help Suo search for her mother. After a mysterious stranger points the young Contractor in the right direction, a long-awaited reunion leads to an unbelievable revelation.

10.title: Your Smile on a False Street Corner

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

10.plot: Tokyo is locked down as chaos follows Amber and the members of Evening Primrose. The Black Reaper knows the destruction that can be unleashed if Amber isn't stopped - and he's willing to risk the wrath of his own team to thwart her.

11.title: The Sea Floor Dries Up, and the Moon Grows Full

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

11.plot: Suo encounters someone she thought was dead and learns the truth behind the mysteries of her past. Unfortunately, the meeting is cut short when several Contractors launch an attack.

12.title: Ark of Stars

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

12.plot: Prophesies are fulfilled, and Suo faces her destiny. Even as her memories fade away beneath the shining moon, hope remains - and a new era begins.

13.title: OVA: Gaiden Part 1

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

13.plot: shows the events between the first and the second seasons. Yin and Hei are trying to escape, but now they are being pursued by several more organizations.

1.title: The Star of a Contract Fell...: Part 1

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

1.plot: A new and deadly breed of covert agent walks the streets. Known as Contractors, these assassins and spies wield bizarre supernatural powers to carry out the dirty work of others. They thrive in the underworld, between rumor and reality, their loyalties always in question. One among these operatives is more mysterious than the rest - The masked killer BK201, the Black Reaper. His true identity and intentions remain unknown, but as his path weaves through the shadows and alleys of Tokyo, blood is spilled on both sides of the law. It's a new age of confusion, and the ...

2.title: The Fallen Star of a Contract Part 2

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

2.plot: Hei's latest task is to keep his fugitive companion, Chiaki, at ease - a woman harboring government secrets and in search of freedom. Hunted by Contractor and cop alike, Hei might keep her safe for now. But nobody can run forever in a world of deception.

3.title: A New Star Shines in the Dawn Sky Part 1

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

3.plot: The Contractors weren't the only product of the appearance of Hell's Gate? Others were changed, as well. And Tahara is the only human to have ever survived a journey into the void. A decade later, he is in isolation within his own skin, alone in his research of the Gate even in the company of his estranged daughter, Mai. Hei is willing to chaperone the girl, but a suffering and lonely child is likely to act out. Mai isn't playing with matches, though fires rage in the city none the less, some perhaps bright enough to hide the light from the newest star in the sky.

4.title: A New Star Shines in the Dawn Sky Part 2

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

4.plot: Mai now wields the powers of a Contractor. Unaware of her dangerous state, she staggers through the streets with deadly fire lighting her path. The roots of her new skills bloom from the sins of her father, and his guilty confession offers no absolution.

5.title: Red Giant over Eastern Europe Part 1

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

5.plot: After suffering a fall from grace, notorious Contractor Havoc is back on the scene. And it seems every agency with an interest in the Gate wants to bring her in. With red tape slowing things down, Hei has the skills to cut through the diplomatic mire.

6.title: Red Giant over Eastern Europe Part 2

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

6.plot:

7.title: The Scent of Gardenias Lingers in the Summer Rain Part 1

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

7.plot: For private-eye Gai Kurasawa, a simple lost pet case quickly turns into a web of death and suspicion. But a sultry woman's charms hold much sway, and he will do what he must to solve the case. It is likely not by chance that Hei happens to be around.

8.title: The Scent of Gardenias Lingers in the Summer Rain Part 2

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

8.plot: Kurasawa is in over his head, the private-eye oblivious to the deadly game of cat and mouse playing out around him in the night. What began as a search for a lost pet has turned into an investigation of a freshly discovered corpse. The detective stumbles upon a suspect, but the crimes committed by the man are far more incredible than those of which he is accused. Thanks to the actions of a jealous queen, violence and the impossible surround a simple gumshoe that is now a player in a contest between pawns.

9.title: The White Dress, Stained with the Girl's Dreams and Blood Part 1

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

11.title: When One Takes Back What Was Lost Within the Wall Part 1

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

11.plot: Urban legends and rumors thrive around Hell's Gate, but some things are fact: People have been known to go mad at the mouth of the supernatural void. And the Black Reaper's new mission will allow him to witness this truth first-hand. The Contractor is to infiltrate PANDORA and recover the Meteor Shard, a much-desired artifact from within the Gate that might hold the answers to questions that haven't even been asked. Hei goes undercover, and when he's not hiding in plain sight behind a broom and a janitor's uniform, he is subjected to risky research - And suspicion. It...

12.title: When One Takes Back What Was Lost Within the Wall Part 2

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

12.plot: The Gate once more offers new riddles to those who investigate its power, and the fresh mysteries lead Hei to even more questions. Clues are popping up in the chaos surrounding Corinna's death, and the signs point to Contractor involvement. Meena suspects a hidden monster, but how can she know for sure when the admitted killer at hand shows glimmers of kindness? But no one knows a murderer like another murderer, so it doesn't take Hei long to prove her theory. He lashes out at one so much like himself, the battle spilling into the streets within Hell's Gate - And at ...

13.title: A Heart Unswaying on the Water's Surface Part 1

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

13.plot: Yin may be used to feeling alone, but the somber Doll has no idea that so many are seeking her company after an encounter with a rival faction leaves her wandering the streets. Faces from her past and present comb the city, but not all who search for Yin are looking keep her safe. Alliances are always shaky at best in the world of Contractors, and Huang can't have the medium falling into enemy hands. When a familiar voice calls out to Yin, offering forth a name not heard for many moons, she will have a choice to make. The wrong decision could lead to her death.

14.title: A Heart Unswaying on the Water's Surface Part 2

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

14.plot: A would-be savior offers a chance for Yin to abandon the life of espionage and murder, and return to her home. But there can be no peace for Yin. She carries the burdens of personal tragedy heavy upon her back, and atonement could very well last forever.

15.title: Memories of Betrayal in an Amber Smile Part 1

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

15.plot: A wave of terrorism is washing over Tokyo. Supposedly secure government buildings are being bombed in quick succession. With so many secret agencies vying for control of the mysteries of Hell's Gate, blame might be tough to assign - though the reappearance of a Contractor named Amber might serve to narrow the list of usual suspects considerably. Operatives on both side of the law are hunting her down. Some want justice, some want revenge. Amber wants chaos in the streets. If her past is any indicator, she'll get exactly what she desires. All signs point to something ...

16.title: Memories of Betrayal in an Amber Smile Part 2

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

16.plot: Tokyo is locked down, and the whole world is on alert. Omens are appearing from the false stars on down, and the last time these signs all swirled in the same breath, bad things happened in South America. Chaos follows Amber as well, and the members of Evening Primrose will stop at nothing to bring their leader's plans to fruition. The Black Reaper knows the destruction that can be unleashed if Amber isn't stopped - and he's willing to risk the wrath of his own team to thwart her. When the two powerful Contractors finally meet face to face, she offers to share a ...

17.title: A Love Song Sung from a Trash Heap Part 1

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

17.plot: Kirihara is obsessed with the drama of betrayal and revenge playing out on the streets she is supposed to protect, but her questions remain unanswered. BK201 and Amber. Are they friends or foes? Hei doesn't have a lot of people he can call confidant, but low level gangster Sakurai Kenji will do for now. The two men are spending a little time together after a chance meeting. The friendship is going to be complicated, though. Kenji is charged by his boss to care for a black-market Doll, and he quickly develops feelings for the passive girl - the same Doll Hei's team is ...

18.title: A Love Song Sung from a Trash Heap Part 2

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

18.plot: The Black Reaper's team is hunting for a missing black-market Doll - and the prize appears on his doorstep, care of his new friend, Kenji. The mafioso has developed feelings for the girl, inciting him to make the dangerous decision to leave the family.

19.title: Dreaming Shallow, Uninebriated Part 1

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

19.plot: The appearance of the Contractors changed everything. Even faith was shaken when the impossible sprung into existence. BK201 has a new mission: Infiltrate a religious cult devoted to worshipping Hell's Gate and assassinate its prophet. The kill will be tough to pull off. The leader of the sect is as mysterious as the object of her congregation's reverence, appearing only once a year - and it is suspected that she has supernatural abilities. Hei will have a contact inside the sect, a Contractor called Shihoko. She isn't unfamiliar to the members of the Black Reaper's ...

episode of.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV Series 2007–2010)

22.plot: November 11 has gone AWOL, and his team fears the worst. Mao knows where the Brit is - the cat's view of the Contractor is unobstructed from Amber's lap. Members of many factions have gathered in EPR headquarters, and the fate of the world is the topic of discussion ... at least the world as Amber sees it. She has no qualms speaking freely of her supposed treachery in South America, but it's her prediction of treasons to come prove that prove to be more eye-opening. Alliances shift easily in this strange war. The Black Reaper will have to face the fact that his most ...

imdb.plot outline: In Tokyo, an impenetrable field known as "Hell's Gate" appeared ten years ago. At the same time, psychics who wield paranormal powers at the cost of their conscience also emerged. Hei is one of the most powerful of these psychic agents, and along with his blind associate, Yin, works for one of the many rival agencies vying to unlock the mysteries of Hell's Gate.
imdb.title: Darker Than Black: Gemini of the Meteor
plot: In Tokyo, an impenetrable field known as "Hell's Gate" appeared ten years ago. At the same time, psychics who wield paranormal powers at the cost of their conscience also emerged. Hei is one of the most powerful of these psychic agents, and along with his blind associate, Yin, works for one of the many rival agencies vying to unlock the mysteries of Hell's Gate.::Anonymous

The 2nd installment to the Darker than Black series. This follows Suo after her house has caught fire and she crosses paths with the previous protagonist Hei. He is searching for a lost friend and takes pity upon Suo and allows her to tag along with him. Together they start to unveil Suo's past and her relationship with her family. As they dig deeper, they discover that somehow what Hei was searching for ties in with Suo. They soon learn a dark secret that changes everything.
